snippet.title: Farworld Pioneers | Release Date & Platform Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Ready your spacesuits and embark on an incredible journey through the galaxy.

Farworld Pioneers launches on PC, Xbox, PlayStation and Xbox Game Pass on May 30th, 2023!

Create your unique gameplay experience in this epic sandbox RPG - explore the unknown reaches of space all by your lonesome, team up in the co-op mode or form hostile factions in PvP!

With hundreds of different items to craft, research, loot, and exploit, you'll need to prepare to take on the galaxy. Build your own colony, recruit AI colonists and assign them with grunt work you don’t feel like doing at the moment! Strap on your handcrafted laser rifle and get ready to venture out into the unknown.

Play the demo and wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1363900/Farworld_Pioneers/
